sentences.en: Balcony suddenly lift a tree flowers, ulterior motives in string, wind bloom.
sentences.cn: 阳台上骤然举起一树花, 枝枝串串, 迎风绽放.

sentences.en: Captain Grant! I was unaware of any ulterior motive by the Haydonites.
sentences.cn: 格兰特舰长! 我不知道到海顿人任何不可告人的动机.

sentences.en: He has an ulterior motive for wanting to see her.
sentences.cn: 他想见她是别有用心的.

sentences.en: He has an ulterior object in view.
sentences.cn: 他心怀鬼胎,他别有用心.

sentences.en: He’s just being nice. I don’t think he has any ulterior motives.
sentences.cn: 他就是好心，我不认为他别有用心。

sentences.en: I select them solely for their convenience in helping me to my ulterior purpose.
sentences.cn: 我所以选择它们,只是为了便于帮助我达到以后的目的.

sentences.en: I suspect he may have had ulterior motives for being so generous.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑他如此慷慨大方也许是别有用心.

sentences.en: I want to know what is our ulterior action.
sentences.cn: 我想要知道下一步的行动是什么.

sentences.en: If you are kind, people may accuse you of selfish, ulterior motives.
sentences.cn: 如果你是善良的, 人们也许会冤枉你自私, 心里不知打着什么主意.

sentences.en: She definitely had an ulterior motive in offering to help.
sentences.cn: 她主动提出帮忙,肯定有不可告人的动机.

sentences.en: She felt so free from ulterior motives.
sentences.cn: 她觉得已毫无言不由衷的必要了.

sentences.en: She must have some ulterior motive for being nice to me—what does she really want?
sentences.cn: 她对我这么好，一定别有用心—她到底想干什么呢？

sentences.en: Sheila had an ulterior motive for trying to help Stan.
sentences.cn: 希拉想帮助斯坦是另有所图的。

sentences.en: The politician played on the patriotic sentiments of the people from ulterior motives.
sentences.cn: 那个政客别有用心地利用人们的情绪.

sentences.en: Their groundless accusation is made with ulterior motives.
sentences.cn: 他们的无端攻击是别有用心的.

sentences.en: This lever must serve some ulterior purpose.
sentences.cn: 这撬棒准是用于不可告人的目的的.

words.tran_cn: 进一步地；未表明地；隐蔽地
将来的，较远的；在那边的；隐秘不明的

trans.tran_cn: 隐秘的，不可告人的，秘密的，矢口否认的
trans.tran_en: a reason for doing something that you deliberately hide in order to get an advantage for yourself
